name: Capytal

leaders.bg: Co-founder and CEO of both NewCo Capital Group and Capytal.com. Forbes Finance Council appointee. Deployed over $2 billion to 45,000+ businesses globally.

name: Cardinal Equity

leaders.bg: Founded Cardinal Equity in 2015. Previously co-founded Harvard Funding. Former CEO at First Choice Credit LLC. Over $10M under management across 1,500+ investments.

desc: Cardinal Equity is a Manhattan-based mid-office brokerage in the MCA sector. Founded 2015. Supports 120+ independent originating offices. Invested in 1,500+ businesses with $10M+ under management.

name: CashBloom

leaders.bg: President. Doctor of Chiropractic degree from Cleveland Chiropractic College. Former CEO at Merchant Resources International.
hooks: Doctor of Chiropractic turned fintech executive
Former CEO of Merchant Resources International

desc: CashBloom is a fintech providing MCAs, business loans, and specialized dental practice capital. Founded 2008 in Woodland Hills, CA. Funding $5K-$1M with 3-24 month terms. Proprietary BloomScore technology.

name: Cashera

leaders.bg: Serial fintech entrepreneur. MFA from MGIMO. Also owns Funders App ($500M in originations). Multi-country business experience.

desc: Cashera is a technology-driven fintech serving gig workers, contractors, and SMBs. Founded 2023 in North Miami Beach, FL. Three product lines: Instant, Select, Private Credit. Claims $1B+ US portfolio. Launched UK operations December 2025.

desc: CashLab Payments is a niche MCA platform focused on the construction industry. Founded 2022. Partners with construction management software. Leadership not publicly disclosed.

name: Catalyst Financial Company

leaders.bg: President of Catalyst Financial. Oversees a factoring operation founded in 1994 with 50+ years of combined principal experience.
hooks: Specializes in oil and gas factoring

desc: Catalyst Financial Company is a Houston-based factoring firm founded 1994. Provides accounts receivable financing across oil and gas, staffing, manufacturing, freight, wholesale distribution. 24-hour financing, no lock-in contracts.

leaders.bg: CEO and founder. Delivered over $50M to businesses. Built A+ BBB rating.

leaders.bg: 40+ years banking experience. Launched SBA division in 2021, reaching Top 50 SBA 7(a) lender status. Navigated $103.6M Cadence Bank acquisition May 2025.

Manages both SBA 7(a) and USDA platforms up to $10M

desc: Chatham Business Capital is the SBA lending division of First Chatham Bank (now Cadence Bank). Launched April 2021, ranked #45 out of 1,738 SBA lenders. Funded $187M in FY2023. Acquired by Cadence Bank for $103.6M May 2025.
